attributes.action: provide free comfy bum toilet roll for diarrhohea sufferers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ring sting is a huge problem leading to many lost work days through ring sting sickness, compulsory comfy bum for all squitters sufferers would save the country millions in lost revenue.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
